document.full_text: nokia, the world's largest phone maker by volume, has started to look for a new chairman to succeed long-time leader jorma ollila, who will step down next year.
document.title: nokia's chairman to step down next year
lines_and_colors: nokia, the world's largest phone maker by volume, has started to look for a new chairman to succeed long-time leader jorma ollila, who will step down next year.
